com.percussion.integration
Class PSWsHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.integration.PSWsHelperBase
      com.percussion.integration.PSWsHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSWsHelper
public class PSWsHelper
extends com.percussion.integration.PSWsHelperBase
implements IPSWsHelper

Author:
dougrand The helper class provides a friendlier interface to the generated client stubs for SOAP. This particular class implements those methods for AXIS.

Method Detail

setPortURL

public void setPortURL(URL url)
Set the target endpoint for all soap requests. This will change the location where the soap envelopes will be sent. This will also save the endpoint in local storage to allow retrieval at any time.

Parameters:
url - the location endpoint of where to send the messages, must not be null or empty

login

public com.percussion.integration.webservices.miscellaneous.LoginResponse login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                                                                Map options)
                                                                         throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                                                                                RemoteException
Login to Rhythmyx, used to switch the locale or community or both. All options within the specified map will be added to the header.

Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
options - a map of options to be added to the credential header, may be null or an empty map
Returns:
a LoginResponse object defined by the sys_Miscellaneous.xsd schema
Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
RemoteException

                                                                                String password,
                                                                                Map options)
                                                                         throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                                                                                RemoteException
Login to Rhythmyx, used to swicth the locale or community or both. All options within the specified map will be added to the header.

Parameters:
username - username for authentication header, may not be null or empty
password - password for authentication header, may not be null or empty
options - a map of options to be added to the credential header, may be null or an empty map
Returns:
a LoginResponse object defined by the sys_Miscellaneous.xsd schema
Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException

getInbox

public PSSearch getInbox(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                         List fieldList,
                         boolean includeActionMenu)
                  throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                         RemoteException
Get the Rhythmyx inbox.

Specified by:
getInbox in interface IPSWsHelper
Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
fieldList - a list of strings to identify which fields to be returned with each content item found, may be null or empty in which case a default set of fields will be returned
includeActionMenu - flag indicating whether or not to retrieve the action menu for each item returned, if false do not retrieve the action menu
Returns:
a PSSearch object with the result of content items, this is defined in sys_SearchParameters.xsd schema
Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
RemoteException

formatContentTypeList

public Map formatContentTypeList(com.percussion.integration.webservices.design.ContentTypeListResponse contentTypes,
                                 boolean sort)
Formats the supplied content type list response into a map.

Parameters:
contentTypes - the content type list to be formatted, not null
sort - true to return the content type map sorted in alpha order, false otherwise
Returns:
a map of content types, the map key is the content type name, as String, the value is the ContentTypeAnonType object, never null, may be empty

formatEditorUrl

public String formatEditorUrl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                              com.percussion.integration.webservices.design.ContentTypeListResponseContentType type)
                       throws MalformedURLException
Returns the fully qualified url for each content editor type specified by the type parameter.

Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
type - the content type to get the qualified url for, may not be null
Returns:
the string of the qualified location of the editor
Throws:
MalformedURLException - if the url from this request was somehow incorrect

search

public PSSearch search(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                       PSSearch search,
                       IPSSearchFilter filter,
                       boolean includeActionMenu)
                throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                       RemoteException
Search for content items within the Rhythmyx system.

Specified by:
search in interface IPSWsHelper
Parameters:
req - the original request from the portlet, may not be null
search - contains the search information to decide what selection and criteria to build the search, may not be null
filter - the filter interface to apply to the result set, may be null @not implemented yet
includeActionMenu - flag indicating whether or not to retrieve the action menu for each item returned, if false do not retrieve the action menu
Returns:
a PSSearch object that contains the search results
Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
RemoteException

openItem

public com.percussion.integration.webservices.standarditem.Item openItem(com.percussion.integration.webservices.header.Authentication auth,
                                                                         int contentID,
                                                                         int revision,
                                                                         boolean includeChildren,
                                                                         boolean includeBinary,
                                                                         boolean includeRelated,
                                                                         boolean checkout)
                                                                  throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                                                                         RemoteException
Gets an existing item from the supplied parameters.

Parameters:
auth - credentials for this call, it may not be null
contentID - The content id of the item.
revision - The revision of the item.
includeChildren - if true, include children in the returned object.
includeBinary - if true, include binary data; otherwise do not include binary data in the returned object.
includeRelated - if true, include the related item(s) in the returned object.
checkout - if true, check out the item afterwards.
Returns:
The specified item, never null.
Throws:
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException - if soap error occurs.
RemoteException - if communication error occurs.

isFtsEnabled

public boolean isFtsEnabled(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                     throws RemoteException,
                            javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
Description copied from interface: IPSWsHelper
This method tells the caller if the attached rhythmyx host is using full text search. Note that the results of this are cached on the client.

Specified by:
isFtsEnabled in interface IPSWsHelper
Parameters:
request - a valid request that must never be null.
Returns:
true if the server is using full text search
Throws:
RemoteException
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException

getItemViewer

public PSSearch getItemViewer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                              String itemList,
                              String viewUrl,
                              List fieldList)
                       throws RemoteException,
                              javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
Return an item viewer search

Specified by:
getItemViewer in interface IPSWsHelper
Parameters:
req - http request, must never be null.
itemList - list of items, must never be null.
viewUrl - view url, must never be null.
fieldList - list of fields, must never be null.
Returns:
The search results for an item viewer
Throws:
RemoteException - when an error occurs communicating with the Rhythmyx server.
javax.xml.soap.SOAPException - when an error occurs in the web services
